text: Mwebwe mwemeye Imana yanyu y’ukuri, abagabo ntiba kengere abagabo bagenzi babo, nkumbure wosanga ari abantu ngira kamaro kubasumba, n’abapfasoni ntiba bakengere abapfasoni bagenzi babo, nkumbure wosanga aribo bantu ngira kamaro kubasumba, kandi ntimutukane mu koresheje amoko yanyu, kandi ntimuhamagarane kumazina mabi y’akagayo, rero izina ribi ryo birwa umuntu ngo yiyonkoye mw’idini rya Isilamu nawe ari umu Isilamu, rero abadasaba ikigongwe abo nibo bahemukiye imitima yabo
